name: agent-onboarding
description: Turn any repo into a self-improving agent environment. Guided 7-phase onboarding produces CLAUDE.md, INTENT.md, PROJECT_BRIEF.md, SPEC_INVENTORY.md, and a full SPECS/ directory. Installs a self-improving runtime that tracks friction, logs errors, and generates structured improvement proposals.
author: Stefan Kuczynski

skills.name: agent-onboarding
skills.description: Onboard any repo into a fully specified, self-improving agent environment

commands.name: onboard
commands.description: Start or resume the 7-phase agent onboarding workflow

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review pending improvement proposals from the runtime

commands.name: reflect
commands.description: Trigger a friction review and generate improvement proposals

commands.name: status
commands.description: Report environment health, spec coverage, and open proposals

agents.name: onboarding-agent
agents.description: Autonomous agent that executes the onboarding workflow and runtime operations

artifacts.name: RUNTIME.md
artifacts.description: Self-improving runtime — installed into target repo during onboarding

artifacts.name: IMPROVEMENT_QUEUE.md
artifacts.description: Proposal queue template — installed into target repo during onboarding
